title: A MUST SEE -- AWESOME RENOVATED STUDIO in FENWAY!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 298154597', 'Rent: $2,100 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER for a 12 month lease -- Fantastic deal on this RENOVATED garden level studio apartment on Peterborough Street in Fenway, in a quiet and professionally-managed building.', ' Includes heat and hot water, carpet throughout the apartment,  renovated tiled open kitchen with STAINLESS STEEL appliances  including MICROWAVE and quarts bar top, full tiled renovated spacious bathroom, and plenty of closet space.', 'Laundry facilities are available on site.', 'Parking may be available for rent based on current demand.', 'Unfortunately the owner does not take students here.', 'PHD candidates with stipend will be considered on a case by case basis.', '1 month fee!', 'The location is absolutely amazing.', "Centrally located nearby Longwood Medical Area, giving access to multiple hospitals such as Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center, Boston's Children's Hospital, Brigham and Women's Hospital.and Dana Farber Cancer Institute.", 'Several train stations (Hynes Conventions is closest), multiple bus lines, and tons of entertainment all within short distance.', 'The Back Bay and Newbury Street & Boylston Street in one direction, and historic Fenway Park in the other.', 'The Emerald Necklace surrounds the area, offering walking and biking paths.', 'There are countless, stores, restaurants, pubs, and more all nearby.', 'To view this apartment or for any questions, please send inquires about this apartment to David.']
